manifest.name: Canvas Filter
manifest.description: This plugin lets you filter Canvas to only show items of specific color, tags or only connected to currently selected node.
manifest.author: Ivan Koshelev

data.manifestValue: This plugin lets you filter Canvas to only show items of specific color, tags or only connected to currently selected node.
data.communityListValue: Filter Canvas to only show items of specific color, tags or only connected to currently selected node.
